snippet: Defending champion Andy Murray says he won't be living in the Olympic Village in Rio de Janeiro, preferring to stay at an apartment with the British tennis team....
lead_paragraph: Defending champion Andy Murray says he won't be living in the Olympic Village in Rio de Janeiro, preferring to stay at an apartment with the British tennis team.

headline.print_headline: Andy Murray Won't Stay at Olympic Village at Rio Games
headline.main: Andy Murray Won't Stay at Olympic Village at Rio Games
